mapper.insert:
select seq_ticket.nextval from dual
insert into movie(tno, t_title, t_price, sno, mno, cno) values(seq_movie.nextval, #{t_title}, #{t_price}, #{sno}, #{mno}, #{cno})
mapper.update: update ticket set mTime = #{t_time} where mTitle = #{t_title}
mapper.select: select count(*) from ticket where cno = #{cno}
